Perfil.profile-funcion: FullStack Developer, FullStack Developer, Python (Django | Flask), Python (Django | Flask)

Secciones.about-me-contenido:
I am a Full Stack Developer specialized in modern web design and development. I focus on helping companies that want to go digital, renew their online presence, or create custom websites that drive their growth.

My main stack combines powerful and up-to-date technologies:
• Frontend → HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React
• Backend → Python with Django or Flask

I create custom websites that not only stand out for their attractive and responsive design, but also communicate clearly, improve user experience, and are ready to scale as your business grows.

With over 15 years of experience in advertising, copywriting, and digital marketing, I bring a unique strategic vision to web development. I don't see websites as simple static pages, but as communication and strategy platforms that turn visitors into customers.

I work independently (freelance) with companies of all sizes in Argentina and Latin America, especially on collaborative projects where I can contribute from both the technical and creative sides. I'm always open to new challenges: from complete website renovations to joining visionary teams to develop innovative solutions.

If you're looking for a Full Stack web developer with a results-oriented approach, contact me to take your digital project to the next level!
